chapters.title: Chapter 35: The Right ThingChapter 36: An Invitation
chapters.info: Shielyn din Sabura Night Waters, p. 557—Windfinder to Zaida, wavemistress of Clan Catelar. She is tall, slender, and cooly reserved. She is almost as tall as Aviendha, and has narrow eyes and a long neck. Like all Windfinders to Clan Wavemistresses, she wears eight earrings on one ear.
